name: schedule_pickup
description: Schedule a package pickup with a carrier

pickup.description: The information necessary to schedule a package pickup

cancelled_at.description: The date and time that the pickup was cancelled in ShipEngine.

carrier_id.description: The carrier_id associated with the pickup

confirmation_number.description: The carrier confirmation number for the scheduled pickup.

created_at.description: The date and time that the pickup was created in ShipEngine.

label_ids.description: Label IDs that will be included in the pickup request

items.description: Label ID that will be included in the pickup request

pickup_notes.description: Used by some carriers to give special instructions for a package pickup

pickup_windows.description: An array of available pickup windows. Carriers can return multiple times that they will pickup packages.

warehouse_id.description: The warehouse_id associated with the pickup

pickup.title: pickup

date_time.description: An [ISO 8601](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601) string that represents a date and time.
date_time.title: date_time

se_id.description: A string that uniquely identifies a ShipEngine resource, such as a carrier, label, shipment, etc.
se_id.title: se_id

address.description:
Any residential or business mailing address, anywhere in the world.

> **Note:** Either `name` or `company_name` must be set. Both may be specified, if relevant.
address.title: address

partial_address.description: A complete or partial mailing address.

address_line1.description: The first line of the street address.  For some addresses, this may be the only line.  Other addresses may require 2 or 3 lines.

address_line2.description: The second line of the street address.  For some addresses, this line may not be needed.

address_line3.description: The third line of the street address.  For some addresses, this line may not be needed.

address_residential_indicator.description: Indicates whether this is a residential address.

city_locality.description: The name of the city or locality

company_name.description: If this is a business address, then the company name should be specified here.

name.description: The name of a contact person at this address.  This field may be set instead of - or in addition to - the `company_name` field.

phone.description: The phone number of a contact person at this address.  The format of this phone number varies depending on the country.

state_province.description: The state or province.  For some countries (including the U.S.) only abbreviations are allowed.  Other countries allow the full name or abbreviation.

partial_address.title: partial_address

address_residential_indicator.description: Indicates whether an address is residential.
address_residential_indicator.title: address_residential_indicator

pickup_window.description: The desired time range for the package pickup.
pickup_window.title: pickup_window

**address_line3**: The third line of the street address.  For some addresses, this line may not be needed.
**address_residential_indicator**: Indicates whether this is a residential address. (default: unknown)
**city_locality**: The name of the city or locality
**company_name**: If this is a business address, then the company name should be specified here.
**country_code**: The two-letter [ISO 3166-1 country code](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_3166-1)

**name**: The name of a contact person at this address.  This field may be set instead of - or in addition to - the `company_name` field.
